name: MXAppRunTimeMetric
desc: An object representing metrics about the amount of time the app is active.

items.name: var cumulativeForegroundTime: Measurement<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The total time the app is in the foreground.

items.name: var cumulativeBackgroundTime: Measurement<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The total time the app is active in the background.

items.name: var cumulativeBackgroundAudioTime: Measurement<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The total time the app is in the background and playing audio.

items.name: var cumulativeBackgroundLocationTime: Measurement<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The total time the app is in the background and using location services.
